Class ParkingLot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParkingLot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeteredLot, RegularLot

    public abstract class ParkingLot
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class: useful for inheriting attributes needed to create a Parking Lot class of specific type

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParkingLot

        public ParkingLot(java.lang.String lotName,
          int lotNumber,
          java.lang.String lotLocation,
          int totalSpaces,
          int reservedSpaces)
        Constructor: Creates a parking lot object with user provided arguments to set its fields
        Parameters:
        lotName - is the parking lot name
        lotNumber - is the parking lot number
        lotLocation - is the parking lot location
        totalSpaces - is the total occupancy space of the parking lot
        reservedSpaces - is the total reserved spaces in the parking lot
